Name: A Cold Faith
Phase0Description: I found the body of a pilgrim on his way to some holy place high in the mountains. He didn't get very far. Someone in Margrave may want to know of his fate.
Phase23Description: I found the body of a pilgrim on his way to some holy place high in the mountains. He didn't get very far. Someone in Margrave may want to know of his fate.
Toast: This pilgrim of the Light could not complete his journey.
